name: 多變項統計分析
goals: Understand the basic concepts of statistical methods for multivariate analysis.
Identify the timing and approach to correctly use the multivariate techniques.
Cultivate the ability to conduct the statistical software.
Be able to correctly analyze data, explain results, and writing reports.
syllabus:
週次     主題  
1\. Introduction, Review of basic statistics/SPSS

2\. Multiple regression 1

3\. Multiple regression 2

4\. SPSS1

5\. Logistic regression

6\. Discriminant analysis

7\. SPSS2

8\. Principal components analysis

9\. Common factor analysis

10\. SPSS 3

11\. **Midterm Exam**

12\. SEM1

13\. SEM2

14\. SEM3

15\. SEM4

16. **Final Exam**

17\. Research paper review1 (self-learning activities)

18\. Research paper review 2 (self-learning activities)

methodologies.note: Lecture on the concepts of statistical methods for multivariate analysis.
Discuss the ideas of data collection and analysis.
Demonstrate how to run the SPSS software and guide students to operate it.

grading.note: Assignment and highlight of each topic
SPSS operation, output explanation, and result generation
SPSS operation, output explanation, and result generation
Class attendance and participation in class discussion

1. Search a journal article for each topic, introduce its statistical technique, and criticize the findings. 
2. Use one of the statistical techniques taught in this class to conduct a study and write an academic article.

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
